title: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
subtitle: Siren Plumbing
series: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
tagline: Some hostels are a bargain. Others cost you your life.

synopsis.short: A lonely musician backpacker becomes obsessed with a beautiful voice singing through the hostel's pipes, following it into the ancient sewers beneath Athens where a trapped siren drowns him in her embrace.

death_teaser: The most beautiful song you'll ever die to.
